General.Name: Savannah Resources Plc
General.Description: Savannah Resources Plc engages in the exploration and development of lithium properties in Portugal. It holds interest in the Barroso lithium project located in northern Portugal. The company was formerly known as African Mining and Exploration plc and changed its name to Savannah Resources Plc in September 2013. Savannah Resources Plc was incorporated in 2010 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Salisbury House, London, United Kingdom, EC2M 5PS
